articles.description:
Permanent File Storage for Web3 Apps With Arweave, Bundlr, Next.js, RainbowKit, and Wagmi
🛠 In this article, I will be showing you how to create a Dapp that allows us to store data on the Arweave network, using @BundlrNetwork on testnet. https://betterprogramming.pub/permanent-file-storage-for-web3-apps-with-arweave-bundlr-next-js-rainbowkit-and-wagmi-18aa1506fa6e

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Devin Abbott
I was with @AirbnbEng during the hype and sunsetting of @reactnative, which ultimately succeeded as a disruptive technology. I see a lot of parallels between React Native in its early days and web3 today. Here's why: https://medium.com/@devinabbott/what-working-at-airbnb-during-its-react-native-era-taught-me-about-web3-6d34d855d892
